User.title: User
User.description: Represents a business owner who has signed up for the application.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

businessName.description: The name of the user's business.

businessContext.description: The business policy, FAQ, or other information for the AI.

facebookPage.description: The URL of the business's Facebook page.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product in a business's catalog.

currency.description: The currency of the price (e.g., 'R' or 'P').

imageUrl.description: A public URL to an image of the product.

productUrl.description: A public URL to the product page on the website.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores profile information for each user.

/users/{userId}/products/{productId}.description: Stores the product catalog for each business/user.
